ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 24
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you are referring to the post by Geoffry, then I believe he said mages get the best variety. Skeletons are second in hps only to the mages Earth
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Daniel C. Daugherty" <daniel@...>
>
> If you believe the man who takes care of the spells (ie. summon elemental,
> skels) for the game, The Magician has the best pets.
>
> Check out the news abt magicians on eq.stratics.com and eqvault
>
>
> > We get better pets overall than mages, we get a huge line of DoT spells,

If you are referring to the post by Geoffry, then I believe he said
mages get the best variety. Skeletons are second in hps only to the mages
Earth elemental. What I don't think he mentioned is that while Skeletons
may have few hps in this case, they _do_ have a much higher AC that earth
elementals, thus making them more powerful over all.

Valdus
